Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Steps for Use ：
1：Successfully configure networking for your amarey Robot Vacuum Cleaner.
2：Download the amarey Mobile APP: In the Apple Store or Android Market, search, download and install amarey Mobile APP, and then register and login.
3：Turn on the power of amarey Robot Vacuum Cleaner, and properly configure networking for the device according to the instructions of amarey Mobile APP.
4：Ensure that the amarey Mobile APP can normally control the device with corresponding commands.
5：Download and register the Amazon Alexa APP and bind the Amarey Robot Vacuum Cleaner Skills on the Amazon Alexa APP.
6：Register and bind Alexa Echo Dot.If you have already configured Alexa Echo Dot, you can skip this step. The following instructions are provided for ios clients.
7：Make sure that your Alexa Echo Dot device has powered on and connected to the Wi-Fi network. After opening the “Amazon Alexa” APP on your mobile phone, select the DEVICES button in the lower right corner and then select the “+” button in the upper right corner to add device operation.
8：Find the Skills & Games tab on Amazon Alexa APP, and enter the search keyword “amarey” to search for amarey Skills, and then bind the amarey account.
9：Select the “ENABLE” button on the details page of amarey Skills and jump to the login page provided by the ankobot company, and enter the login username and password for amarey APP to complete the binding.
10：After the binding is completed, the amarey Skills will automatically detect and identify the amarey Robot Vacuum Cleaner associated with the account number, and all devices will be displayed in the “All Devices” label under the DEVICES tab after about 20s, including echo dot, current Amazon Alexa APP, amarey Robot Vacuum Cleaner and other devices.
11：Select the amarey Robot Vacuum Cleaner device to enter the details page of device, and make related settings on this page. For example, click “Edit Name” to modify the device name. For convenience, the device name is changed to “one” here.
12：After the device name is set, the Robot Vacuum Cleaner can be controlled with voice control commands, which arein this sequence format: “「Awakening Word」 「Action Words」「Device Name」” (Currently there are only 2 action commands:turn on and turn off).
 For example: “Alexa turn on one” means to start the Robot Vacuum Cleaner
 “Alexa turn off one” means to stop the Robot Vacuum Cleaner
